official_title: A Phase-I Trial for Simultaneous Imaging of Tumor Hypoxia and Proliferation in Patients With Treatment- Naïve High-Grade Glioma
inclusion_criteria:
* Male or female ≥ 18 years of age
* Documentation of a suspected HGG diagnosis based on clinical and MRI findings
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnant or breastfeeding
* Contraindications to receiving Positron Emission Tomography (PET) imaging (e.g. claustrophobia)
